title: Kangaroo Island
creator_credit: South Australian Government Tourist Bureau and J.A. Correll
brief_description: A day on the Island, starting with fish being landed at dawn from the Kingscote Jetty. Includes visits to the friendly seals at Seal Bay and the kangaroos and koalas at Flinders Chase, the Remarkable Rocks, lighthouses and beaches. Water-skiing at American River, swimming at Penneshaw and a poolside party in the evening.
